prompt_variables.format_instructions:
The output should be formatted as a JSON instance that conforms to the JSON schema below.

As an example, for the schema {'properties': {'foo': {'title': 'Foo', 'description': 'a list of strings', 'type': 'array', 'items': {'type': 'string'}}}, 'required': ['foo']}
the object {'foo': ['bar', 'baz']} is a well-formatted instance of the schema. The object {'properties': {'foo': ['bar', 'baz']}} is not well-formatted.

Here is the output schema:
```
{'$defs': {'ExtractedEntity': {'properties': {'para_number': {'description': 'Paragraph number from which this entity has been extracted', 'title': 'Para Number', 'type': 'integer'}, 'entities': {'additionalProperties': {'items': {'type': 'string'}, 'type': 'array'}, 'description': 'Map with keys being the sub_entity and values being the extracted values from the specific paragraph', 'title': 'Entities', 'type': 'object'}}, 'required': ['para_number', 'entities'], 'title': 'ExtractedEntity', 'type': 'object'}}, 'description': 'Always use this tool to structure your response to the user.', 'properties': {'extracted_entities': {'description': 'List of extracted entities', 'items': {'$ref': '#/$defs/ExtractedEntity'}, 'title': 'Extracted Entities', 'type': 'array'}}, 'required': ['extracted_entities']}
```
